Luciana Tavares

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8929263604171497
  • Última atualização do currículo em 20/06/2019

Luciana Tavares is assistant professor at NanoSYD, Mads Clausen Institute (MCI), University of Southern Denmark (SDU). She received her PhD in 2011 in Nanotechnology from SDU in Denmark and her M.Sc. in Physics in 2008 from the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS), Brazil. Her current research interest is nanotechnology with focus on electrical and optical properties of organic thin films. (Texto informado pelo autor)
